sentence: A recent poll conducted by Franklin & Marshall College found Lieutenant Governor John Fetterman leading the Democratic race for Pennsylvania’s U.S. Senate seat, but which Republican appears to be ahead for the primary…if there is one clear front-runner?
author: Avery Van Etten
title: Test your knowledge: March 11 weekly news quiz

sentence: The results are as follows: Dr. Mehmet Oz: 16% Dave McCormick: 15% Kathy Barnette: 7% Jeff Bartos: 6% Carla Sands: 5% George Bochetto: 2% Someone else: 6% Do not know: 43% On the Democratic side, here are the results: John Fetterman: 41% Conor Lamb: 17% Malcolm Kenyatta: 4% Someone else: 9% None: 2% Do not know: 26% Other findings Economic concerns remain high, with voters continuing to feel frustrated and mostly dissatisfied with President Joe Biden's performance.
title: Poll: No clear frontrunner among Republican US Senate candidates

author: Stephen Robinson
title: PA Senate Candidate John Fetterman Leading Race To Convince Voters He’s Better Than Dr. Oz
Democrats meet for 1st live, prime-time Senate race debate
